text: Günther Marks (28 November 1897 – 4 March 1978) was a German church musician, organist and composer. He was born in Gollnow, Pomerania, and died in Dahme, Brandenburg. == External links == * * Günther Marks – Ein Leben für die Kirchenmusik kirche-wriezen.de (PDF) Category:German organists Category:German male organists Category:1897 births Category:1978 deaths Category:People from Goleniów Category:People from the Province of Pomerania Category:20th-century German musicians Category:20th-century organists Category:20th-century German male musicians
title: Günther Marks
